title: Fix upload button flickering and add progress indicator

requirements.text: Fix the upload button in the Features component so it responds correctly when clicked and does not just flicker

quotes: Upload button is not working as it only flickers

acceptanceCriteria: Upload button triggers file upload when clicked
Button does not flicker or display inconsistent visual states

requirements.text: Add upload progress indicator showing percentage completion during file upload in the Features component

quotes: No response reg. its upload status / progess in %ge,.

acceptanceCriteria: Progress percentage is displayed during file upload
Progress indicator updates in real-time as upload progresses
Progress reaches 100% when upload completes successfully
User receives clear feedback throughout the upload process

requirements.text: Display success or error status message after file upload completes in the Features component

quotes: No response reg. its upload status

acceptanceCriteria: Success message displays when upload completes successfully
Error message displays if upload fails
Status message is clearly visible to the user

constraints: Maintain existing markdown parsing functionality in the Features component
Do not modify the backend file upload implementation
Preserve existing pagination and search features in the Features tab
nonGoals: Changing the file format support beyond markdown
Redesigning the overall Features component layout
